GeneDef.label: warhowl
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can perform a wicked warhowl, using a powerful bellow and psychic connection to call on their allies to fight more aggressively.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Effects of the warhowl will stack up to 10 times.

GeneDef.label: germline reimplanter
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can implant a copy of their germline into another person through an injector organ. Their own genetic material will then regrow very slowly. If they implant while their genes are regrowing, they will die. Xenogenes will be unaffected.
